Name: Candle In Darkness
About the game: The human being is inexplicable and difficult to understand, each of us is afraid of something at some point. Almost all people are afraid of darkness, they see in it danger, monsters, terrible things. Are you afraid of darkness and the monsters that live in it? Do you dare to test yourself? Candle in Darknes is a first-person gothic horror game , the main advantage of which is dynamic gameplay, complex and in some places unclear gameplay features. Try to pass it without dying once. At the moment the game is in the early access. The game is developing rapidly - become part of the community of the game and offer your ideas.
